channel.title: Carloop with access to HS CAN via ODB connector
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm new to carloop - just started to plug a carloop with photon into my ODB port and read a CAN trace. That all works fine! I wonder if the carloop hardware can connect to and of the other CAN pins of the OBD connector. My vehicle (Volvo V60) has HS-CAN and LS-CAN pins. It there a jumper or software switch that I can change to connect the carloop device to the HS-CAN?
Thanks!

item.title: Carloop with access to HS CAN via ODB connector
item.dc:creator: bwildered
item.description:
I Have a 2007 XC70 and am also wondering how to address different High and Low CAN devices.

Read full topic
item.source: Carloop with access to HS CAN via ODB connector
